verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* salvation, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* cried day \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w night|strong="H1121"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* thee:

Let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* prayer enter \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w presence|strong="H5048"\w*; incline \w thine|strong="H5048"\w* ear \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*:

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* soul \w is|strong="H6440"\w* full \w of|strong="H6440"\w* troubles, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5186"\w* life draweth nigh \w unto|strong="H6440"\w* Sheol.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am counted \w with|strong="H7646"\w* \w them|strong="H5060"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* go \w down|strong="H5060"\w* \w into|strong="H2416"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w pit|strong="H7585"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H5315"\w* \w no|strong="H5060"\w* help:

Cast \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* dead, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* slain \w that|strong="H1397"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grave, \w whom|strong="H1397"\w* \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* rememberest \w no|strong="H1961"\w* \w more|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H3381"\w* they \w are|strong="H1961"\w* cut \w off|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H3381"\w* \w thy|strong="H3381"\w* hand.

\w Thou|strong="H3027"\w* hast \w laid|strong="H7901"\w* \w me|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* lowest pit, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* dark \w places|strong="H3027"\w*, \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H2142"\w* deeps.
\w Thy|strong="H7896"\w* wrath lieth hard upon \w me|strong="H7896"\w*, and thou hast afflicted \w me|strong="H7896"\w* with \w all|strong="H7896"\w* \w thy|strong="H7896"\w* waves. \qs Selah\qs*

Thou hast \w put|strong="H5564"\w* mine acquaintance \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*; thou hast \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* abomination unto \w them|strong="H5921"\w*: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* am shut \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* cannot \w come|strong="H2534"\w* forth.

\w Mine|strong="H3045"\w* eye wasteth \w away|strong="H7368"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* reason \w of|strong="H4480"\w* affliction: \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* called daily \w upon|strong="H3045"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w spread|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* hands \w unto|strong="H3318"\w* thee.

Wilt \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* shew wonders \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* dead? \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* deceased arise \w and|strong="H3068"\w* praise \w thee|strong="H5869"\w*? \qs Selah\qs*

\w Shall|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* lovingkindness \w be|strong="H4191"\w* declared \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* grave? \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* faithfulness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* Destruction?

\w Shall|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H5608"\w* wonders \w be|strong="H2617"\w* known \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* dark? \w and|strong="H2617"\w* \w thy|strong="H5608"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H2617"\w* \w in|strong="H6913"\w* \w the|strong="H5608"\w* land \w of|strong="H6913"\w* forgetfulness?

But \w unto|strong="H6666"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* cried, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* morning \w shall|strong="H2822"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* prayer \w come|strong="H3045"\w* \w before|strong="H3045"\w* thee.
\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, why castest thou off \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul? why hidest thou \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6923"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* afflicted \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ready \w to|strong="H3068"\w* die \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* youth \w up|strong="H4480"\w*: \w while|strong="H5315"\w* \w I|strong="H5315"\w* suffer \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* terrors \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* distracted.
\w Thy|strong="H5375"\w* fierce wrath \w is|strong="H6041"\w* gone \w over|strong="H5375"\w* me; \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* terrors \w have|strong="H5375"\w* cut me \w off|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w They|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H5674"\w* round \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* water \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day \w long|strong="H5921"\w*; \w they|strong="H5921"\w* compassed \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w*.

Lover \w and|strong="H3117"\w* friend hast \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* put \w far|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w mine|strong="H5437"\w* acquaintance \w into|strong="H5921"\w* darkness.
